mapper.select: /* mail.findNotProcessedMailWork */ SELECT TEN_ID , EML_RCPT_HISTREC_UUID , EML_TASK_SUBJ_UUID , RCPT_EML_TYP_CCD , RCPT_STS_CCD , SNDR_EML , SNDR_NM , RCPNT_EML , RCPNT_NM , EML_TIT , EML_CONT , ATHG_UUID , RCPT_RES_MSG , RCPT_DTTM , REGR_ID , REG_DTTM , MOD_DTTM , MODR_ID FROM EML_TASK_RCPT_HISTREC WHERE RCPT_EML_TYP_CCD = 'RE' AND RCPT_STS_CCD = 'SYS_PRCSG_PRGSG' ORDER BY REG_DTTM ASC

/* mail.findExcelReceiveMailById : 이메일 업무 수신 메일 상세 조회 */ SELECT RH.EML_RCPT_HISTREC_UUID , SH.EML_SND_HISTREC_UUID , SH.EML_ADD_CONT , RH.RCPT_EML_TYP_CCD , RH.SNDR_EML , RH.SNDR_NM , RH.RCPNT_EML , RH.RCPNT_NM , RH.EML_TIT , RH.EML_CONT , RH.ATHG_UUID , RH.RCPT_RES_MSG , RH.RCPT_DTTM , RH.RCPT_STS_CCD , AP.EML_TASK_SUBJ_UUID , AP.EML_TASK_UUID , AP.TASK_UUID , AP.EML_TASK_DTL_UUID , AP.EML_RE_YN , AP.CLSG_YN , AP.EML_TASK_STS_CCD , EX.EML_TASK_UUID , EX.EML_TASK_NM , EX.EML_TASK_EXPLN , EX.EML_TASK_TYP_CCD , ML.EML_TMPL_CD , ML.CTMPL_UUID FROM EML_TASK_EXCEL_ATH EX INNER JOIN EML_TMPL_SETUP ML ON EX.TEN_ID = ML.TEN_ID AND EX.EML_TMPL_CD = ML.EML_TMPL_CD INNER JOIN EML_TASK_PRGS_STS AP ON EX.TEN_ID = AP.TEN_ID AND EX.EML_TASK_UUID = AP.EML_TASK_UUID INNER JOIN EML_TASK_RCPT_HISTREC RH ON AP.TEN_ID = RH.TEN_ID AND AP.EML_TASK_SUBJ_UUID = RH.EML_TASK_SUBJ_UUID LEFT OUTER JOIN EML_TASK_SND_HISTREC SH ON AP.TEN_ID = SH.TEN_ID AND AP.EML_TASK_SUBJ_UUID = SH.EML_TASK_SUBJ_UUID WHERE EX.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND RH.EML_RCPT_HISTREC_UUID = #{p.eml_rcpt_histrec_uuid} AND RH.EML_TASK_SUBJ_UUID = #{p.eml_task_subj_uuid} AND RH.RCPT_EML_TYP_CCD = 'RE' AND (RH.RCPT_STS_CCD = 'SYS_PRCSG_PRGSG' OR RH.RCPT_STS_CCD ='EML_RCPT_FAIL') AND SH.SND_STS_CCD ='SND_PASS'
